urls.title: Baggage drop-off at airport for checked baggage - KLM
urls.description: You can drop off your checked baggage at the self-service drop-off points or at the check-in desks at the airport. Check what the opening hours are.

data.text: @Bogdaness If you reached Flying Blue Silver status or higher, you are allowed one piece of check-in baggage on top of the baggage allowance in your ticket, presuming your flights are operated by KLM, Air France, Aircalin, Air Corsica, HOP! or other SkyTeam-partners.
